name: We hate Simon
description:
We hate Simon is a short isometric platformer game made for the GeoJam, the theme was "The other side".

HOW TO PLAY:

Move with WASD and Jump with SPACE

The objective of the game is to get to "The other side" and hit Simon (Gosh, how I hate him). In order to cross to the other side be sure you use the right platform shape indicated by the screen.

Have fun!

Game Developer:

Michael Todemann

Music by Bacayne (This guy is incredible, you can check his music following the link below.)

https://open.spotify.com/artist/52kFk8jDUeBSOCQDbym9y0
